name: NSSeguePerforming
desc: A set of methods that support the mediation of a custom segue.

items.name: func prepare(for: NSStoryboardSegue, sender: Any?)
items.desc: Called when a segue is about to be performed.

items.name: func shouldPerformSegue(withIdentifier: NSStoryboardSegue.Identifier, sender: Any?) -> Bool
items.desc: Called immediately prior to the performance of a storyboard segue.
